headline: 2000 - Ebola haemorrhagic fever in Uganda - Update 15
main_text: As of 31 October the Ugandan Ministry of Health has reported cumulative figures of 239 cases, including 75 deaths. A logistician from the International Rescue Committee will be joining the task force in Gulu district.  He will be assisting the Ugandan District Medical Office with the management of supplies and general transport, as well as with the deployment of people and teams in the task force.
